links.*: Edgar Rice Burroughs: Master of Adventure
Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien

wikitext.*:
At an unknown date, [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Richard A. Lupoff|Richard Lupoff]]'''.

*'''Contents:''' Tolkien denies any influence from the writings of [[wikipedia:Edgar Rice Burroughs|Edgar Rice Burroughs]] on the creation of [[Shelob]].
*'''Publication:''' A brief extract from the letter was published in ''[[Edgar Rice Burroughs: Master of Adventure]]'' (written by Richard Lupoff) and in ''[[Tolkien Criticism: An Annotated Checklist]]''. Part of the extract was reprinted in [[Orcrist 4|''Orcrist'' (Issue 4, 1969-70)]].
{{references}}
<small>
*''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'', at Tolkienbooks.net</small>
